organisation_name: Italian association of clay brick and roof tile producers (ANDIL)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
ANDIL (National association of clay bricks and roof tiles producer) represents about 73% of overall national production. In Italy 93 factories dependent on a total of 111 companies, with approximately 4,000 workers, produce different types of bricks in particular for residential building in its various forms (masonry, roofing, partition walls, veneers, flooring and horizontal structures). 
ANDIL is a member of "Confindustria", the leading organization representing the manufacturing and service industries in Italy, of Federcostruzioni (Federation of product, installation and service industries for constructions) and, on a European scale, of the "TBE" (European Tiles & Bricks Producers Federation).
